SEARCH
Package edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model

Class TrainFactory

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.VehicleFactory
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.TrainFactory
public class TrainFactory extends VehicleFactory
Factory class for creating train vehicles in the simulation. The TrainFactory determines whether to create an electric or diesel train based on the current time of day using a TrainStrategy.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • TrainFactory

      public TrainFactory(LocalTime currTime)
      Constructs a TrainFactory with the current time. Initializes the appropriate train strategy (day or night) based on the time.
      Parameters:
      currTime - the current time

  • Method Details

    • createVehicleStrategy

      public TrainStrategy createVehicleStrategy()
      Description copied from class: VehicleFactory
      Abstract method to create a vehicle strategy. Subclasses must implement this method to define specific vehicle strategies.
      Specified by:
      createVehicleStrategy in class VehicleFactory
      Returns:
      a new instance of a VehicleStrategy

    • getNextVehicle

      public Train getNextVehicle(StorageFacility storageFacility, Line line, Counter counter)
      Creates the next train to be used in the simulation. Determines the type of train (electric or diesel) based on the TrainStrategy. Ensures the train can only be created if the required type is available in the storage facility.
      Parameters:
      storageFacility - the facility that stores available electric and diesel trains
      line - the route that the train will operate on
      counter - the counter for generating unique train IDs
      Returns:
      a new ElectricTrain or DieselTrain if available, or null if not
